targets.query:
from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "particulates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ug_atm_2_5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "bedroom")
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "co2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "co2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "bedroom_co2")
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "particulates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ug_atm_2_5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "balcony")
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airkaz:particulates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city"] == "Усть-Каменогорск")
  |> group(columns: ["station"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

matcher.options: _value ул. Гастелло, 14, ГУ «Ресурсный центр-школа дистанционного и профессионального обучения», проходная

targets.query:
from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ceb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_ug")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["formula"] == "SO2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> group(columns: ["address"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

matcher.options: _value ул. Гастелло, 14, ГУ «Ресурсный центр-школа дистанционного и профессионального обучения», проходная

targets.query:
from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ceb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_ug")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["formula"] == "$ceb_pollutant")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> group(columns: ["address"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kazhydromet")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city"] == "Усть-Каменогорск")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["code"] == "$kg_pollutant")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _value: r._value * 1000.0
  })
)
  |> group(columns: ["address"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kazhydromet")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["city"] == "Усть-Каменогорск")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["code"] == "WS")
  |> group(columns: ["address"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "airmon")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["code"] == "AT")
  |> group(columns: ["address"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "airkaz:particulates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm25")
  |> group(columns: ["city"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "particulates")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ug_atm_2_5")
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "co2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "co2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "bedroom_co2")
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "airmon")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
